primary.description: Vibrant Emerald/Teal for primary actions (Buttons, Active States)

background.description: Deep Zinc Black for the main app frame/body

card.description: Pure white for content cards to create high contrast against dark bg

structure.description: The app body is Dark (#09090b). The Sidebar is Dark. The Main Content Area is a large White Card with rounded corners, creating a 'floating' effect.

buttons.primary: bg-[#10b981] hover:bg-[#059669] text-white font-medium shadow-lg shadow-emerald-900/20 transition-all active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-white text-zinc-900 border border-zinc-100 shadow-sm rounded-xl

inputs.style: bg-white border-zinc-200 text-zinc-900 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#10b981] focus:border-transparent rounded-md placeholder:text-zinc-400

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'fa-brands' (FontAwesome) for social icons if needed.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on Teal buttons is White. Ensure text on White cards is Zinc-900.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Configure 'tailwind.config.js' to use the specific colors defined above. Override the default 'zinc' palette if necessary to match the #09090b background.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Floating Dashboard' layout. The Sidebar should be fixed on the left (Dark). The Main Content should be a scrollable White Card area to the right.
4. LOGIN: The Login page must be a centered White Card on a Dark (#09090b) background. Use the Logo Placeholder at the top.
5. WHATSAPP: For the Inbox, use a 2-column layout. Left: List of chats (White bg). Right: Active chat (Light Gray bg). User messages: Green (#10b981). System/Lead messages: White.
6. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components but style them to match the 'Rounded + High Contrast' aesthetic. Remove default 'slate' borders and use 'zinc-200'.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and navigation items.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state.
